english.segment1: Lost in an ocean, it seems my time has come. I'm hardly breathing as fear fills my lungs. The life is fading fast. I don't know how much longer I have
english.segment2: Breathe the life in me. I'm drowning in this tragedy. Of living for myself and what I think I need. You're the only one that can bring me back to life. Just breathe. Breathe the life in me
english.segment3: Sinking and hopeless to the depths of my own soul. Wondering what happened, did I ever have control?. My life is fading fast. I don't know how much longer I have
english.segment4: Breathe the life in me. I'm drowning in this tragedy. Of living for myself and what I think I need. You're the only one that can bring me back to life. Just breathe. Breathe your life in me
english.segment5: And I feel you inside of my veins. And all so true. The beating of my heart. When you, when you
english.segment6: Breathe your life in me. I was drowning in the tragedy. Of living for myself and what I thought I needed. You're the only one that can bring me back to life (2x). Just breathe. Just breathe
